title: Did Mark Twain Say ‘It’s Easier to Fool People Than to Convince Them That They Have Been Fooled’?
subtitle: While the quote "it's easier to fool people than to convince them that they have been fooled" is often attributed to Mark Twain, there's no evidence that the author actually wrote this phrase.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Mark Twain said that it's easier to fool people than to convince them that they have been fooled.
